name: Chessmaster: Grandmaster Edition
description:
Chessmaster: Grandmaster Edition is a digital board game developed by Ubisoft. It came out on 30-10-2007. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Chessmaster: Grandmaster Edition has a Metascore of 73, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Chessmaster: Grandmaster Edition on PC.
